org.foxlabs.validation.path

Class PathIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.foxlabs.validation.path.PathIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator<ViolationException>

    public final class PathIterator
extends Object
implements Iterator<ViolationException>
    This iterator used by ValidationException to iterate over all violations hierarchy and allows to obtain path of the current violation.
    Author:
    Fox Mulder
    See Also:
    NodeFormatter, ValidationException.iterator(), ValidationException.iterator(NodeFormatter)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PathIterator(ValidationException violations, NodeFormatter formatter)
      Constructs a new PathIterator with the specified violations hierarhy and path separator.

        Constructs a new PathIterator with the specified violations hierarhy and path separator.
        Parameters:

        formatter - Formatter to be used for formatting violation nodes on the path.
